name: Lights Off! (Technical Demo)
description:
You are a loose in a mysterious house without door to escape room, you need to offer a ritual to open every door and escape from this dark house.  But every time the room get very dark and you can see anything but you know somebody is near you. Stop moving and breathing, don't let that thing to hear you and try escape the fastest you can.

This is a short horror experience with less than 5 minutes of gameplays. This is an idea I have for a future bigger project with a more interesting story. This is just to try this mechanic and know how good it is for an horror game.
